query: Could you assist in structuring a week-long journey for two, starting in Washington and heading to three different cities in New York from March 10th to March 16th, 2022? We have a budget of $10,600. Please note, the hotels should be able to accommodate children under 10 years.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[New York,Binghamton,Syracuse]
